page.title: 13MARYKIRK OLDER PEOPLE 2
page.content: The senior citizens have seen many changes in the village. New houses and a new school have been built during the past 20 years. An indoor bowling club was formed about three years ago. There used to be 3 Sunday School teachers and the Church had more regular attenders. Marymill and Balmanno Farms provided milk for the village and there used to be weekly dances in the hall. In the future, they would like to see more people at Church and lots more community spirit. There should be more for the younger people such as a tennis court and perhaps a bowling green for the older generation. Most people like the village as it is.
